channel.title: econ on rs.io
channel.description: Recent content in econ on rs.io

item.title: Pareto Principle Examples and History
item.description: Economics consists of theoretical laws which nobody has verified and of empirical laws which nobody can explain.

item.title: Worldbuilding, Worldbuilders, and Mathematics
item.description: This week, I was introduced to the hobby of worldbuilding — inventing imaginary places, making maps, elaborating histories.

item.title: The Life Satisfaction of Economists
item.description: Tyler Cowen has written a post on a paper about the life satisfaction of economists.

item.title: The Terrible Future Isnâ€™t: Drone Delivery Edition
item.description: Last night, Amazon’s CEO Jeff Bezos appeared on 60 Minutes and spoke about the possibility of using drones to deliver small packages (“drone delivery“).

item.title: Criticism of Economics
item.description: I don’t have the requisite expertise to lay out compelling criticism of economics as a whole, and I suspect such an endeavor would be profitless (heh).
